title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\Rule\ReplacementAction
name: ReplacementAction
description:
Replaces a term in the query. Multiple replacement candidates can be specified. All query_terms will be replaced with the replacement term.

Example: Replace "gShoe" with "google shoe".

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.Rule.ReplacementAction

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.query_terms
params.description: Terms from the search query. Will be replaced by replacement term. Can specify up to 100 terms.

params.name: data.replacement_term
params.description: Term that will be used for replacement.
